name: Davidoff - Millennium - Short Robusto
additionalNotes:
Handcrafted in the Dominican Republic, Davidoff cigars are high in price and high in quality. Each one looks stunning and burns like a dream. Seamless wrappers, perfect burn, easy draw, relentless consistency, balanced flavorâ€¦.time and again. Rolled by a select few and blended to perfection, all Davidoff 
Davidoff's Millenium Blend is typically regarded as their best cigar. Featuring an Ecuadorian Sun Grown wrapper, Millenium Blend releases a full-flavored, full-bodied blend that's rich and satisfying.
